entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: PlayNav - No ads in videos!
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Premium FeaturesÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $4.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Premium FeaturesÔºö$0.99

Application Description

Are you tired of interruptions caused by ads in your YouTube videos? The new YouTube PlayNav video browser will block all intrusive ads that appear while watching your videos, so you can enjoy your favorite videos smoothly and without interruptions. Plus, our app offers features you‚Äôll love: ‚Ä¢ On-Screen Playback: Watch YouTube videos while using other apps. ‚Ä¢ Audio-Only Mode: Listen to any YouTube video with your screen locked. ‚Ä¢ Auto Shutdown: Set a sleep timer. (Premium) ‚Ä¢ Loop Mode: Automatically repeat your favorite videos. ‚Ä¢ Learning Mode: Learn languages using subtitles. (Premium) It also includes essential features such as playlists, speed adjustment (improved), related videos, AirPlay, and more to enhance your video-watching experience. ¬ª HOW TO USE PLAYNAV? ON-SCREEN PLAYBACK (PIP) (Premium) Watch YouTube videos while using any other app. Once activated, the player will shrink on your screen, allowing you to move or hide it with a double tap. ¬ª How to activate it? 1. While playing a video, tap the PIP icon in the upper-left corner (two small screen icons). 2. While a video is playing, swipe up from the bottom of your iPhone, and the player will appear on your screen. AUDIO-ONLY MODE Listen to the audio of your favorite YouTube videos with your iPhone screen locked. Use it while exercising, walking, or before bed. Combine it with the auto shutdown feature to relax while listening to your favorite videos! ¬ª How to activate it? 1. Enable On-Screen Playback. 2. Then, lock your iPhone, and the audio will continue playing. AUTO SHUTDOWN Bedtime? Find your favorite YouTube video or playlist, set the auto shutdown timer, and let your favorite audio accompany you as you fall asleep. ¬ª How to activate it? 1. Tap the Sleep icon (moon) in the player. 2. Select the time you want for auto shutdown. 3. You can combine it with Audio-Only Mode. LOOP MODE (REPEAT VIDEO) Want your video to play on repeat? Use Loop Mode to replay your video as many times as you like. You can also combine it with Audio-Only Mode. ¬ª How to activate it? 1. Tap the Repeat icon. Your video will keep playing on loop until you disable it. LEARN LANGUAGES WITH SUBTITLES (LEARNING MODE) Now you can learn languages using subtitles! When you activate Learning Mode, you will see both the original subtitles and the translation in your language. You can also adjust the playback speed to better understand each word. ¬ª How to activate it? 1 Search for videos in the language you are learning. 2 Once your video starts playing, tap the Learning Mode button next to the video title. ‚Äì TRY PLAYNAV NOW! ‚Äì Enjoy all basic features for free and unlock Premium with a one-time purchase. Minimum requirements: ‚Ä¢ iOS 15 or higher. ‚Ä¢ 3G connection or higher. ¬ª Related keywords: YouTube, YouTube Music, YouTube Vanced, ad blocker, no subscription, skip YouTube ads, ad-free music, block pop-ups, adblock for YouTube, block pop-up ads, ad-free content, premium ad blocker, AdBlock Plus, remove ads, YouTube without ads. - Need help? Visit: playnav.vidiom.app or contact us at info@playnav.vidiom.app Terms of Service: playnav.vidiom.app/terms-of-service Privacy Policy: playnav.vidiom.app/privacy-policy

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Day R Premium: last world war
entry.id: Day R Premium: last world war-us-1748926949082
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Handful of capsÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $1.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.99

In-App Purchases

  • Handful of capsÔºö$0.99
  • Pile of capsÔºö$4.99
  • Case with capsÔºö$19.99
  • Sausepan of capsÔºö$9.99
  • Special packÔºö$4.99
  • Great packÔºö$9.99
  • Small packÔºö$0.99
  • Useful packÔºö$2.99
  • Standart packÔºö$1.99
  • Big packÔºö$19.99

Application Description

Survive in post-nuclear USSR: defeat diseases, hunger and enemies! Play Online also! Survive with other players together. Benefits of Premium version: - Unique pet Raven - Starter Kit - Caches of useful items in shelters - Expanded selection of perks - Chat without any limitations - Reduced waiting time between parcels - Access to all kinds and colors of map markers Can you survive in the world destroyed after a nuclear war? With radiation, hunger and diseases around you. You have to cross the whole country and save your family. Who knows if they are alive, or maybe radiation and deadly virus have already reached them? Reveal a secret of the apocalypse and get your memories back during a journey across the huge territory of the USSR in the 80th. It is not easy to survive after apocalypse. You'll face the real hungry games! Monsters, zombie, thirst, uncountable diseases and injuries, blood-thirsty enemies ‚Äì you have to fight it all. Craft all your resources: weapons, clothes, means of transport. - Hardcore survival: Hunger, zombie and radiation won't give you a chance to relax. - Realistic world: The turn of the seasons, huge map of USSR and more than 2500 different towns and cities. Hunt animals, but be careful: even rats can injure you seriously! Explore the wilderness! - A lot of opportunities: Multicraft, obtaining skills, hundreds of crafting schemes, a lot of ammunition. - People and stories: Interesting quests and helpful allies. An open game world. - Improve your skills: Mechanics, medicine, chemistry and many others. - Cooperative mode: The Online mode with a chat room, exchange of items and united fightings. Multiplayer survival game. Explore the abandoned houses and shelters. Find weapon and build transport using various materials. Remember everything you learnt on chemistry and physics! It is the most realistic surviving game! Features: - –°raft system ‚Äì get resources, hunt, find useful objects or weapon and create your own one! - Hardcore simulator of survival - Journey across the wilderness map in the multiplayer mode - Choose the difficulty mode: sandbox, real life or online War never changes. In 1985 USSR went down before an unknown enemy. In a few days the entire country became a radioactive wasteland - violence, hunger and diseases reign here now. When you no longer loose in the fight with the death, the other survivors wait for you in the cooperative - the Online mode let you survive together dealing with difficulties, talking in the chat room and sending gifts to each other. User agreement: http://tltgames.ru/license-agreement-en

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Train Dispatcher!2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.99 ‚Üí $0.59 [$0.29 ~ $0.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.59

Application Description

Drive trains and carry passengers on Japanese railway lines. „ÉªSimple brain game "Train Dispatcher!2" is a brain game with simple rules. No expertise required. Train fans, game fans, everyone can enjoy it. „ÉªTo everyone who will become a train dispatcher In the morning in Japan, customers are waiting for the arrival of the train to go to work. Let's start the train and transport the customers. „ÉªGoal of the game Japanese railway companies are for-profit organizations. Let's aim for high operating profit! „ÉªHow to make profit Fare revenue - Departure cost = Operating profit. Fare revenue is generated when passengers board at a station. Example) If two passengers board a train at a station with a fare of 20, the company receives 40. Departure costs are charged according to the number of cars when the train departs. Example) 30 for a 2-car train, 40 for a 4-car train, and 70 for a 10-car train. One person can ride in one car. Fare revenue is generated when customers board the train. Adjust the driving schedule and the number of vehicles to aim for the highest profit. Departure costs. If you run too many trains and the occupancy rate drops, you'll lose revenue. „ÉªHow to operate The game is very easy to operate and the rules are simple. All you have to do is adjust the number of train cars and make the trains depart at the best time. As the game progresses, various variations such as express trains and transfer stations will appear. „ÉªVolume Enjoy over 50 routes. Please experience the wide variety of transportation strategies of Japanese railway companies. No ads, no charges. „ÉªNo ads, no billing Please concentrate on the game. Children can also enjoy the game. Share your results on Social Media. „ÉªTrain lines you can play with JR East Japan JR Tokai JR West Japan JR Kyushu Tobu Tokyu Seibu Keio Keikyu Keihan Hankyu Hanshin Kintetsu Meitetsu Odakyu Nankai Seitetsu Sotetsu Keisei Tokyo Metro Osaka Metro Toei Subway Tsukuba Express „ÉªCapacity is about 130MB The storage burden is also small. There is no heavy processing at all.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Wall of insanity
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.69 [$0.49 ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.69

Application Description

Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series. It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world. You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless. Story: A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins... Key Features: - Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world. - A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go? - A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition. And your life. - Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed. Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds. - Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Inspire Pro
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $19.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$4.99

Application Description

Available exclusively on the App Store, meticulously designed to be beautifully powerful, and painstakingly engineered for iPad ‚Äî Inspire Pro delivers an incredibly fast and realistic painting, drawing, and sketching experience that you can take with you wherever you go and use whenever inspiration strikes. Our proprietary painting engine Sorcery‚Ñ¢ takes full advantage of the GPU to render brush strokes with brilliant 64-bit color, laser-sharp sub-pixel precision, and insanely fast speed. While the strokes of a wet oil paint brush look beautiful on their own, the breathtaking blending effects of a dry brush will absolutely stun you. Graze the canvas with just a bit of pressure to add a subtle blur to your artwork or use stronger pressure to actually mix existing colors on the canvas together to create new ones. Whether you are a budding artist, seasoned professional, or somewhere in-between, you will enjoy the simplicity and power of the most intuitive and compelling illustration app for iPad, Inspire Pro. Amazing Brushes ‚Ä¢ 150 high quality brushes to choose from, divided into 15 sets: Oil Paint, Airbrushes, Spray Paint, Paint Splatter, Graphite Pencils, Wax Crayons, Markers, Chalk, Charcoal, Pastels & Cont√©, Basic Shapes, Complex Shapes, Shape Outlines, Patterns, and Textures ‚Ä¢ All brushes can be used as a Wet Brush, Dry Brush (Blending), or Eraser ‚Ä¢ Over 20 different settings are available to customize brush strokes with powerful versatility and variation The Best Painting App for iPad ‚Ä¢ Sorcery‚Ñ¢, the fastest 64-bit painting engine on the App Store ‚Ä¢ Full-fledged Apple Pencil support for pressure, tilt angle, orientation, and double-tap ‚Ä¢ Smart Keyboard support with over 20 context-sensitive keyboard shortcuts ‚Ä¢ Create a canvas of any size up to 16K (64MP) on iPad Pro ‚Ä¢ Dual-texture brushes ‚Ä¢ 64-bit color ‚Ä¢ All device orientations are supported all the time ‚Äî switch from portrait to landscape painting with ease ‚Ä¢ 1000 levels of undo and redo are available ‚Ä¢ Touch and slide hotspots can be used to quickly change brush size, opacity, and pressure without opening a menu ‚Ä¢ The eyedropper tool can be used with a touch and hold gesture to select paint colors from the canvas ‚Ä¢ The canvas can be moved around, rotated, and zoomed in and out up to 6400% Canvas Playback Video Recording ‚Ä¢ Brush strokes are automatically recorded as you paint without any delay ‚Ä¢ You can play the video of your artwork being created stroke-by-stroke directly in the gallery ‚Ä¢ Exported videos are high quality HD at up to 1080p resolution Full-Featured Color Picker ‚Ä¢ Choose any paint color you can dream of with the intuitive color picker ‚Ä¢ HSB and RGB sliders accompany a large color circle, color square, and opacity slider ‚Ä¢ Your latest colors are saved to a palette automatically while you paint ‚Ä¢ You can also save your favorite colors to a palette with drag and drop Visit snowCanoe.com to check out more screenshots, videos, and artwork.

Application Screenshot

iPad
